stories.text:
I work in IT and made some adjustments to my lifestyle. Here is my weight every Saturday over 18 months. I am surprised at the amount I still consume. Maybe more what, than how much. Main thing I have learned is that diet is about what you eat over a month, not a day. The massive slice of Snickers Cheesecake, with ice-cream, I had after last night won't impact my weight unless I do it regularly.

* Walk 2.8 miles daily (so Google fit tells me) * Don't eat much bread, no butter * Skimmed milk * Porridge and fruit for breakfast * Vegetable curry etc for lunch * 4 or 5 pieces of fruit a day * Lots of Coke Zero / Diluted juice * Dinner - whatever * Don't eat after dinner
stories.title: Show HN: My Weight over 18 Months
